thread.title: Playright Eve Ensler to get honor at John Lennon tribute
thread.title_full: Playright Eve Ensler to get honor at John Lennon tribute - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: Playright Eve Ensler to get honor at John Lennon tribute
text:
Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 1 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 1 FILE - In this Jan. 22, 2014 file photo, Eve Ensler, co-director of the short film "One Billion Rising," poses for a portrait during the 2014 Sundance Film Festival, in Park City, Utah. Ensler will be honored with the John Lennon Real Love Award by the grassroots non-profit Theatre Within, on Dec. 4 at Symphony Space for her creative life’s work and worldwide social activism. The award will be part of The 35th Annual John Lennon Tribute-75th Birthday Celebration. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP, File)
Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP FILE - In this Jan. 22, 2014 file photo, Eve Ensler, co-director of... Playright Eve Ensler to get honor at John Lennon tribute 1 / 1 Back to Gallery NEW YORK (AP) — Tony Award-winning playwright and activist Eve Ensler will get a new honor next month —the John Lennon Real Love Award.
The grassroots nonprofit Theatre Within said Thursday it will honor the author of "The Vagina Monologues" and "Emotional Creature" on Dec. 4 at Symphony Space for her creative life's work and worldwide social activism.
The award will be part of The 35th Annual John Lennon Tribute-75th Birthday Celebration that will have performances by Joan Osborne , Martin Sexton , Bettye LaVette, Joseph Arthur , Willie Nile, Lucy Kaplansky, Richard Shindell , Nicole Atkins , Jonatha Brooke, Chris Smither , Toshi Reagon and Rich Pagano.
Ticket prices are $75, $95 and $125, with VIP options available.
___
Online: http://www.lennontribute.org
